name: DATANION (CITREX 2022)
description:
Install instructions

Storyline: 

Datanion is a special agent in a secret organisation, specialising in secretly passing crucial messages to the others organisation, so as to analyse the enemy’s actions. Suddenly one day, Datanion received an urgent task which required Datanion to pass the military secret to the allies of the organisation. In order to complete this task, Datanion will face various dangers that Datanion hasn’t met before and need to survive from that. If Datanion is attacked by the enemy’s, Datanion will die and not be able to pass the message to the allies of the organisation. Without delay, Datanion started this journey…

How to play:

V = Interact with NPC

LEVEL 1

A/S = Move left / right

W = Jump

Right Click = Melee Attack

LEVEL 2

Space =  Shooting

LEVEL 3

Left Click = Grappling hook

LEVEL 4

E = Shield
